name: Ding Dong - Addictive Arcade Action
description:
DING DONG is a minimalist, challenging, and fast paced one touch arcade game

Touch the screen to move, avoid all the obstacles, and keep moving or explode.
An incredibly addictive and fast score chaser.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
● Fast & infinite play/replay game play
● An addictive, fast paced, and never ending score-chaser challenge
● Simple One Touch Controls
● Cool Minimalist Neon Graphics
● Awesome Power ups
● Online Leaderboard
● Endless (infinite) game play
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Website : http://www.nickervision.com
Twitter : https://twitter.com/nickervision

I hope you enjoy it!
